fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Set up cameras at a target's house during the night. Only 2 cameras may be set up at any given time; creating another will remove the first.
- Look at the cameras of a player's house during the night. You will discover a random visitor of that target the previous night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will learn who the "evil" factions visits each night. You will not know which "evil" faction they were visited by, or how many "evil" players visited them.
